org.apache.streams.dropwizard

Class StreamDropwizardBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.local.builders.LocalStreamBuilder
      • org.apache.streams.dropwizard.StreamDropwizardBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, StreamBuilder

    public class StreamDropwizardBuilder
extends LocalStreamBuilder
implements StreamBuilder
    StreamDropwizardBuilder is currently a light wrapper around LocalStreamBuilder.

    It's a seperate class because they will almost certainly deviate going forward

    See Also:
